properties.displayName: Potential Privilege Escalation Using Symlink Between Osk and Cmd
properties.query:
DeviceProcessEvents
| where (ProcessCommandLine contains "mklink" and ProcessCommandLine contains "\\osk.exe" and ProcessCommandLine contains "\\cmd.exe") and (FolderPath endswith "\\cmd.exe" or ProcessVersionInfoOriginalFileName =~ "Cmd.Exe")

tags.name: description
tags.value: Detects the creation of a symbolic link between "cmd.exe" and the accessibility on-screen keyboard binary (osk.exe) using "mklink". This technique provides an elevated command prompt to the user from the login screen without the need to log
